titleStmt.title: Joy of Angels. Delivered in a sermon before the Honourable Society of Grayes-Inne, on the last day of June, 1656. By Ja: Rutherford D.D.
titleStmt.author: Rutherford, James, D.D.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J. G. for Henry Seile, and are to be sold at his shop in the Bulwark near the Tower,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: on blank prelim. leaf: "Hear is all of this paper, that came out those two months of July & August"; on title page: "July 16th"; July 16".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in the Bulwark near the Tower
